Description:
Our client is a Leading Company in Retail Industry. They are now looking for an Accountant to join them.Roles & Responsibilities:Perform Accounts Receivable function (full cycle), customer registration and maintaining customer files, reporting, analysis, reconciliation, resolving issues and discrepancies, responding to queries, and processing adjustments and journal entries. 
Ensure compliance of VAT and any fiscal regulations.
Assist in month-end closing and statutory reporting requirements.
Assist in routine activities relevant to general administration.
Assist in research and resolution of all types of accounting issues.
Assist in internal and external audit requirements.
Strict compliance and implementation of internal controls etc.Skills
Skills: • Knowledge and experience of ERP or accounting system, preferably SAP
• Must have prior experience in Accounts Receivable.
• Excellent command of both written and spoken English
• Knowledge and experience of GCC VAT
